channel.title: How do i add shops? -Detailed-
channel.description:
Ok how do i add shop? i want to know where to put the code, plz do not post:
autospawn.cfg, the shops.cfg
i want to know what to add in there. this is better:
Ok first open auto spawn and put the npc of your choice
then open shops and put ***** **** **** *** and edit it the way you like
then do whatever elsebut explain it plz!
TY!

it is, but how do i pick wich npc has the shop?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 19, 2008, 10:04:19 am[/size][hr]anyone?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 20, 2008, 02:52:58 pm[/size][hr]seriously i need this hel

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add shops? -Detailed-
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

shop = #	Name_Goes_Here				2	2	FirstItem	Amount

[ul][li]Ok, So here - ‘shop = #’, you put the ID of the shop, where the ‘#’ is.[/li]
[li]Replace ‘Name_Goes_Here’ with the Name you want to give the shop, Do not use spaces, use '_'s for spaces there.[/li]
[li]Leave the two '2’s as they are.[/li]
[li]Replace ‘FirstItem’ with the ID of the First item you want to have in the shop.[/li]
[li]Replace ‘Amount’ with the Amount of the first Item you want to have in the shop.[/li][/ul]

If you want to add more items, Hit the Tab button after the Amount of the first item, and Add:
‘ID Amount’ Again, replacing ‘ID’ with the ID of the item, and ‘Amount’ with the Amount of the item you wish to have in the shop.

I hope this is Understandable for you.

Read full topic
